channel.title: Themes on WinterSalmon DevBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Themes on WinterSalmon DevBlog

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: What I did to install hugo Step 1: Install Hugo brew install hugo Step 2: Create a New Site cd directory-to-create-hugo-project hugo new site my-site-name Step 3: Add a Theme cd my-site-name git init git submodule add https://github.com/calintat/minimal.git themes/minimal # overwrite setting file with theme default setting file cp themes/minimal/exampleSite/config.toml . Step 4: Add Some Content hugo new posts/hello-hugo.md Step 5: Test on local machine hugo server -D Step 6: build and upload to github mkdir public cd public git init
